mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Anna Maria Washington Thornton to George Fayette Washington, 1815 March 1
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thornton, Anna Maria Washington, 1788-1816
mdRecord.dcterms:description: She sends the letter written fortnight ago [see letter of 12 February 1815] from Wellington near Alexandria -- it was not sent earlier because Jack was struck with rheumatism and could not carry it to Alexandria -- again rebukes her brother for not writing -- her health is improved, but pain and cough continue. Autograph letter signed, 1 page, integral address panel, postmarked "[ ] Mar. 2," laminated, watermark (Levering & Co.). Name on original manuscript appears as "A. M. Thornton".
